# thunder_delete_threat_intel (Resource)

`thunder_delete_threat_intel`: Delete threat-intel files

__PLACEHOLDER__

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "thunder" {
  address  = var.dut9049
  username = var.username
  password = var.password
}
resource "thunder_delete_threat_intel" "thunder_delete_threat_intel" {
  database = "webroot"
}
```
